fields_of_interest: Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Circular economy, Waste legislation, Water legislation 
Landill legislation, EMFF, MSFD 
Port Reception Facilities, EU regional seas conventions
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Waste Free Oceans, a registered public charity with non- profit status, is a ground breaking public-private foundation that mobilizes the fisheries sector, public authorities and the international plastics industry. Our aim is to contribute to clean oceans by reducing and reusing floating litter. Starting as a pilot project in Europe to encourage fishermen and the plastics industry to collaborate, we now engage in marine litter clean-ups around the world. Together with companies we then turn collected waste into innovative, sustainable products.
